SELECT bar_code from skus sk where

SELECT sku.id AS id, sku.sku_code AS skuCode, sku.sku_name AS skuName, sku.item_id AS itemId, sku.spu_code AS spuCode, sku.property_value_id AS propertyValueId, sku.property_value AS propertyValue, sku.bar_code AS barCode, sku.weight, sku.market_price AS marketPrice, sku.predict_channel_price AS predictChannelPrice, sku.spec_info AS specInfo, sku.picture, sku.is_deleted AS isDeleted, br.`name` AS brandName, br.id AS brandId, ca.`name` AS categoryName, ca.id as categoryId FROM skus sku, brand br, items it, category ca WHERE sku.item_id = it.id AND it.brand_id = br.id AND ca.id = it.category_id
AND sku.sku_name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{skuName},"%")
AND br.`name` LIKE CONCAT("%",#{brandName},"%")
AND sku.sku_code IN
#{item}

SELECT sku.id AS id, sku.sku_code AS skuCode, sku.sku_name AS skuName, sku.item_id AS itemId, sku.spu_code AS spuCode, sku.property_value_id AS propertyValueId, sku.property_value AS propertyValue, sku.bar_code AS barCode, sku.weight, sku.market_price AS marketPrice, sku.predict_channel_price AS predictChannelPrice, sku.spec_info AS specInfo, sku.picture, sku.is_deleted AS isDeleted, br.`name` AS brandName, br.id AS brandId, ca.`name` AS categoryName, ca.id as categoryId FROM skus sku, brand br, items it, category ca WHERE sku.item_id = it.id AND it.brand_id = br.id AND ca.id = it.category_id AND sku.is_valid = '1'
AND sku.sku_name LIKE CONCAT("%",#{skuName},"%")
AND br.`name` LIKE CONCAT("%",#{brandName},"%")
AND sku.sku_code IN
#{item}
